description:
When nova migrates VMs it fails to connect to another machine when prompted to accept hosts key.
Nova should run SSH with ignoring this option
title: Can not migrate because of strict hosts check

comments.content:
When nova migrates VMs it fails to connect to another machine when prompted to accept hosts key.
Nova should run SSH with ignoring this option
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~sshnaidm

comments.content: Sergey, marking this Low priority because a workaround exists: simply set the Nova operating system user's SSH configuration to ignore host keys.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jaypipes

comments.content: I actually don't think this is a valid bug. We make some assumptions that the nova environment is setup correctly. Ignoring the security checks in code is a very bad option.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~sdague
